item.title: How to Change Android Default YouTube App (YouTube Vanced, New Pipe, ...)
item.description: Requirement Android's default YouTube App is not very convenient, there are lots of Open Source alternatives (YouTube Vanced (removed), NewPipe, ...), although you can install them, but if you don't change the default YouTube App, it's still inconvenient. Solution Android Settings -> Apps -> Default apps -> Opening links It will list all Apps, choose YouTube, and you will see the following screen. Disable "Open supported links". Return to previous menu, choose your prefered YouTube App, I use NewPipe, and choose * + Add link*.
